mapper.sql: id, email, user_name, role_id, create_at, create_user, update_at, update_user, mobile, type, password, name, del_flag

mapper.update:
update users
email = #{email,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update users set email = #{email,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select u.id, u.email, u.user_name as userName, u.name, u.role_id as roleId, r.role_name as roleName, u.mobile, u.type from users u inner join roles r on u.role_id = r.id where 1 = 1 and del_flag = 0
and email like '%'+#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'%'
and user_name like '%'+#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}+'%'
and u.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select u.id, u.email, u.user_name as userName, u.name, u.role_id as roleId, r.role_name as roleName, u.mobile, u.password, u.type from users u inner join roles r on u.role_id = r.id where 1 = 1 and u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag = 0
